DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the predicting factors for asthma remission in children.
DOC.brief_title: Predicting Factors for Asthma Remission in Children
DOC.detailed_description: Children who were diagnosed as having asthma during the period of 2004-2007 and reevaluated in 2015.
DOC.criteria: Children who were diagnosed as having asthma during the period of 20042007. Patients who had underlying disease with chronic respiratory disease (ex. tuberculosis, bronchiectasis), primary immunodeficiency, other seriously interfering diseases Medical records have been lost.
